summary:
I'm specialized in Healthy Plant-Based Cooking, Food Nutrition and Recipes Development. 
I have studied Western Nutrition, Traditional Chinese Medicine and Macrobiotics. 
I have a dynamic and flexible personality - i learn fast and know very well (spoken & written) English, Dutch and Polish - my mother language. 
I like to work in a organized manner with respect to everyone in the business, as well as the clients.
I have over 10 years of diverse cooking experience in Poland, the Netherlands and other countries in Europe.
I have started my career as a Chef in 2009 in a small vegetarian cafe in Poland.
In 2011 i've moved to Amsterdam, opened my company and started to work Free-Lance in diverse positions for various Health Oriented Companies:
-  Restaurant & Salad/Juice Bar Chef
- Catering 
- Organizing Healthy Cooking Workshops and Presentations
- Chef: production of Healthy Snacks for the Largest Organic Supermarket in the Netherlands - Ekoplaza 
- Co-organizing Food & Art events and Health Oriented Retreats (Food & Movement as topic) in France and in the Netherlands
- Retreat/Festival Chef, a.o. for one of the Biggest Yoga Festivals in the Netherlands - Yoga Festival Terschelling  
- Chef during International Macrobiotic Conferences
- I've also worked as a Personal Chef for private customers in Amsterdam

My job at almost every restaurant was to:
- Create a healthy dish or a new menu or to
- Transform an existing dish/menu into a more healthy version

I have experience with minimalizing the production costs and making the whole production line more efficient, simple, operating smoothly and economically sound, while still trying to make the most healthy/sustainable/environment friendly business choices by the means of: 
- Cutting down the cooking time in various ways
- Implying different cooking techniques/tools
- Simplifying the inventory management/minimalizing the number of suppliers whenever possible
- Simplifying the menu: creating multi-functional half-products from which you can cook as many dishes as possible instead of that you make many preparation work for only one dish 
- Finding a smooth balance between the quality and price of inventory items: organic/non organic or industrially processed vs traditionally processed etc.

Thanks to my diverse Restaurant/Event/Food Production experience and Nutrition/Chinese Medicine/Macrobiotic knowledge i can help any business that wants to create a Healthy menu, a Vegan Restaurant Start-up or Wellness Center, because since 2019 i'm a internationally certified Iokai Shiatsu Therapist, besides a Vegan Chef.
